thread.title: Direct link to watch NFL game on Yahoo: Online stream for Bills-Jaguars in London
thread.title_full: Direct link to watch NFL game on Yahoo: Online stream for Bills-Jaguars in London

author: Matthew Fairburn | mfairburn@syracuse.com
title: Direct link to watch NFL game on Yahoo: Online stream for Bills-Jaguars in London
text:
London â€” American football is back in London, and for the first time ever, an NFL game will be streamed internationally . 
The Buffalo Bills take on the Jacksonville Jaguars at 9:30 a.m. Sunday in Wembley Stadium. 
The game can be watched online at Yahoo by clicking this link . 
This is all you have to do: Connect your computer (or another device such as Apple TV, Roku or Xbox) to the Internet. Click the link 
The game can be watched on CBS in Buffalo and Jacksonville but won't be available anywhere else, including on DirecTV's Sunday Ticket.
